sys_remote_update_set.description: Task Appointments is a front end to presenting time slots for task records. A definition record defines the group and template used to create an appointment for a particular group based a schedule.

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_22d711e9dbfbb600c3beffa31d961909
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task">u_task_appointmentISNOTEMPTY^work_startVALCHANGES^ORwork_endVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_task_appointment" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_start" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_end" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Enforce Task Appointment Schedule</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	//Make sure the seconds are 00
	current.work_start = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().setZeroSeconds(current.work_start);
	current.work_end = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().setZeroSeconds(current.work_end);
	
	/*
	* Validate Dates:
	* Make sure start date is within the scheduled defined in the Task Appointment record.
	* Make sure the end date is an interval of the appointment duration defined in the Task Appointment record.
	*/
	
	var datesValid = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().checkTaskDates(current);
	if (datesValid != "allClear") {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(datesValid);
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michael.ritchie</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-06 14:27:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>22d711e9dbfbb600c3beffa31d961909</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Enforce Task Appointment Schedule</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_22d711e9dbfbb600c3beffa31d961909</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>michael.ritchie</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-07 12:34:29</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=22d711e9dbfbb600c3beffa31d961909"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_section_515da604dbe3760087c1fd441d961988
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_ui_section caption="" section_id="515da604dbe3760087c1fd441d961988" sys_domain="global" table="u_task_appointment" version="3" view=""><sys_ui_annotation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_plain_text>false</is_plain_text><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-22 19:22:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>2bad40d24f442300d1676bd18110c7f8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-22 19:22:14</sys_updated_on><text><p>This record is used along with the <a title="Appointment Scheduling" href="sp_config?id=widget_editor&sys_id=25490ef0dba7b600c3beffa31d961986&spa=1" target="_blank">Appointment Scheduling</a> and <a title="Appointment List" href="sp_config?id=widget_editor&sys_id=ca217829db544700d6afffb41d961931&spa=1" target="_blank">Appointment List</a> Service Portal widgets.  At a minimum you must enter the name, the schedule to leverage that defines the availability, appointment duration, and the task table to use when creating an appointment. The Task Values is a template field that can be used to set field values in the appointment record created by the Service Portal widgets. Note: The group field can be leveraged to automatically assign the task appointments to a specific group. If the Assignment Group is specified in the Task Values template field, that value will take priority.</p>
<p><br />The following fields on the Task table (including any table that extends task) are leveraged with this solution:</p>
<ul>
<li>work_start - this is set with the time from the widget</li>
<li>work_end - this is set with the time chosen from the widget plus the appointment duration specified in this record.</li>
<li>u_task_appointment - this is set with the sys_id of this record</li>
</ul>
<p>For more details on this feature, please see the <a title="Task Appointment Scheduling" href="https://community.servicenow.com/community?id=community_blog&sys_id=e46e6eaddbd0dbc01dcaf3231f9619ba" target="_blank">Task Appointment Scheduling</a> post on the ServiceNow Community.</p></text><type display_value="Info Box } //Day of Week parsed[2] = moment(dt).format("ddd"); //Short Date (no year) parsed[3] = moment(dt).format("MMM D"); return parsed[type]; } $rootScope.$on('appointmentCreated', function(event, data) { getCurrentAppointments(); }); function getCurrentAppointments() { c.server.get({ action: 'getCurrentAppointments' }).then(function(response) { if (JSON.parse(response.data.currentAppointments).length > 0) { c.currentUserAppointments = processTheTimes(JSON.parse(response.data.currentAppointments)); c.noAppointments = false; } else { c.noAppointments = true; } }); } function processTheTimes(appointments) { for (var i = 0; i < appointments.length; i++) { appointments[i].work_in = moment(appointments[i].work_start).fromNow(); } return appointments; } }]]>c$brand-primary:#4b8cfb !default; $icon-color:red; .bg-darkblue { margin-bottom: 10px; } .upcoming-appointments { background: #fff; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; margin-top: 15px; sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><client_script><![CDATA[function scheduleAppointment($rootScope, $timeout, $http, $scope) {
    var c = this;
    c.$onInit = function() {
        c.selectedSlot = "";
        c.timeSlotReturn = "";
        c.alertSuccess = false;
        c.setReminder = false;
        c.appntShortDescription = "";
        c.appntDescription = "";
        c.appntLocationSysid = "";
        c.selectedReminderTime = c.data.reminderTimes[0];
    }

    c.getTimeSlots = function(date) {
        c.dateFormatted = moment(date).format("dddd, MMMM D YYYY");
        c.server.get({ action: 'getTimeSlots', selectedDate: moment(date).format("YYYY-MM-DD") }).then(function(response) {
            if (response.data.timeSlots && response.data.timeSlots.length > 0) {
                c.timeSLots = JSON.parse(response.data.timeSlots);
                if (c.options.layout == 'Dropdown') { c.selectedSlot = c.timeSLots[0]; }
            }

        });
    };

    c.locationChosen = function(location) {
        c.appntLocation = location;
        c.appntLocationSysid = location.sys_id;
    }

    c.getLocations = function(val) {
        return $http.get('/api/now/table/cmn_location?sysparm_query=nameLIKE' + val + '^ORstreetLIKE' + val + '^ORcityLIKE' + val + '^ORstateLIKE' + val + '&sysparm_limit=5', {
            headers: {
                'Accept': 'application/json',
                'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                'X-UserToken': window.g_ck
            }
        }).then(function(response) {

            return response.data.result;
        });
    };

    c.setupReminder = function(reminderTime) {
        c.server.get({ action: 'setupReminder', selectedTime: reminderTime, taskSysid: c.timeSlotReturn.sys_id }).then(function(response) {
            c.reminderSetup = response.data.reminderReturn;
            $timeout(function() {
                c.alertSuccess = false;
                c.setReminder = false;
            }, 5000);
        });
    }



    function processTheTimes(appointments) {
        for (var i = 0; i < appointments.length; i++) {
            appointments[i].work_start = moment(appointments[i].work_start).fromNow();
            if (appointments[i].duration > 0) {
                appointments[i].duration = Math.floor(appointments[i].duration / 60);
            }
        }
        return appointments;
    }
    c.datePickerPopup = {
        opened: false
    };
    var today = new Date();

    if (!c.options.max_date) {
        c.options.max_date = 30;
    }
    c.dateOptions = {
        showWeeks: false,
        formatYear: 'yyyy',
        maxDate: today.setDate(today.getDate() + parseInt(c.options.max_date)),
        minDate: populateDate(),
        startingDay: 1
    };


    // Disable weekend selection
    c.disabled = function(date, mode) {
        return (mode === 'day' && (date.getDay() === 0 || date.getDay() === 6));
    }

    c.openDatePickerPopup = function() {
        c.datePickerPopup.opened = true;
    };

    c.submitTimeSlot = function(selectedDate, selectedSlot) {
        var obj = {
            'action': 'setTimeSlots',
            'meetingDate': selectedDate,
            'meetingTime': selectedSlot
        }
        if (c.appntLocation || c.appntDescription || c.appntShortDescription) {
            obj.additionalFields = {
                'short_description': c.appntShortDescription,
                'description': c.appntDescription,
                'location': c.appntLocationSysid
            }
        }

        c.server.get(obj).then(function(response) {
            if (response.data.timeSlotReturn) {
                c.timeSlotReturn = JSON.parse(response.data.timeSlotReturn);
                if (c.timeSlotReturn.sys_id) {
                    c.alertSuccess = true;
                    if (c.setReminder) {
                        c.setupReminder(c.selectedReminderTime.value.display_value);
                    }
                    c.getTimeSlots(selectedDate);
                    c.appntShortDescription = "";
                    c.appntDescription = "";
                    c.appntLocationSysid = "";
                    c.appntLocation = "";
                    $rootScope.$broadcast('appointmentCreated', '');
                }
            }
        });
    };


    function populateDate() {
        c.minDate = new Date();
        c.getTimeSlots(c.minDate);
        c.selectedDate = c.minDate;
        c.dateFormatted = moment(c.selectedDate).format("dddd, MMMM D YYYY");
        return c.minDate;
    }
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>$time-slot-bg:#e4edf9;
$time-slot-text:#607795;
$brand-primary:#4b8cfb !default;
.btn-submit {
    width: 10%;
    min-width: 80px;
    @media screen and (max-width: 769px) {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

.switch-part {
    width: 25%;
    float: left;
    min-width: 160px;
    @media screen and (max-width: 769px) {
        width: 50%;
    }
}

.time-selector {
    width: 30%;
    min-width: 150px;
    float: left;
    @media screen and (max-width: 769px) {
        width: 50%;
    }
}

.time-card-container {
    clear: both;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.time-cards {
    width: 47%;
    height: 60px;
    float: left;
    padding: 10px;
    color: $time-slot-text;
    margin: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    background: $time-slot-bg;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    @media screen and (max-width: 414px) {
        width: 100%;
    }
    &.btn-selected {
        background: $brand-primary;
        color: #fff;
        .fa {
            color: #fff;
        }
    }
    p {
        margin: 0px;
    }
}

.appointment-scheduler {
    min-width: 320px;
    background: #fff;
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 6px;
    margin-top: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    .btn.disabled {
        opacity: .35;
    }
    .reminder-setup {
        padding: 10px;
        span {
            font-size: 16px;
        }
        .reminder-select {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 100px;
            margin-left: 5px;
            margin-right: 5px;
            height: 30px;
        }

    .remove-padding-left {

    .slot-selector {

    .reminder-select {

    .reminder-select-label {

    /* line 1, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

    .input-switch {

    /* line 21, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

        /*box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 3px 0px #777;*/

    /* line 31, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

    /* line 61, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

    /* line 69, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

    /* line 76, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

        /*border: 1px solid #278efc;*/

    }
    /* line 87, sass/custom/_switches.scss */

        content: '1';

    }
    button {
        margin-right: 5px;
        margin-bottom: 5px;
        &.btn-slots {
            border-color: transparent;
            background: $time-slot-bg;
            color: $time-slot-text;
            width: 70px;

            }

        }

    .no-slots {
        color: $brand-danger;
    }

        clear: both;
    }

        -webkit-appearance: none;

}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>appointment-scheduling</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Appointment Scheduling</name><option_schema>[{"name":"title","label":"Title","type":"string"},{"displayValue":"Task Appointment","name":"task_appointment_record","label":"Task Appointment Definition","type":"reference","value":"u_task_appointment","ed":{"reference":"u_task_appointment"}},{"hint":"Appointment button layout choices","name":"layout","default_value":"Chiclets","label":"Layout Options","type":"choice","choices":[{"label":"Dropdown","value":"Dropdown"},{"label":"Chiclets","value":"Chiclets"},{"label":"Timecards","value":"Timecards"}]},{"hint":"This leverages an out of the box feature that will send an email prior to a date/time value in a task.","name":"allow_reminders","default_value":"","label":"Allow reminders","type":"boolean"},{"name":"max_date","default_value":"30","label":"Maximum available date (in days)","type":"integer"},{"name":"show_short_description","label":"Show Short Description","type":"boolean"},{"name":"show_description","label":"Show Description","type":"boolean"},{"name":"show_location","label":"Show Location","type":"boolean"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[// populate the 'data' variable with catalog item, variables, and variable view
(function() {

    data.reminderTimes = getReminderChoices();

    function getReminderChoices() {
        var tempArray = [];
        var reminderGR = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
        reminderGR.addQuery('element', 'remind_me');
        reminderGR.addQuery('inactive', false);
        reminderGR.orderBy('sequence');
        reminderGR.query();
        while (reminderGR.next()) {
            var obj = {};
            $sp.getRecordElements(obj, reminderGR, 'label,sys_id,value');
            tempArray.push(obj);
        }
        return tempArray;
    }

    if (input) {
        if (input.action == 'getTimeSlots') {
            data.timeSlots = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().getTimeSlots(options.task_appointment_record, input.selectedDate);
        }
        if (input.action == 'setTimeSlots') {
            data.timeSlotReturn = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().createAppointment(options.task_appointment_record, input.meetingTime, input.additionalFields);
        }
        if (input.action == 'setupReminder') {
            data.reminderReturn = new global.TaskAppointmentUtils().createReminder(input.taskSysid, input.selectedTime)
        }
    }
})()]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sush.chandrashekar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-21 23:38:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>25490ef0dba7b600c3beffa31d961986</sys_id><sys_mod_count>943</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Appointment Scheduling</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_25490ef0dba7b600c3beffa31d961986</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-04 20:43:55</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="display:none;">
  <symbol id="icon-location" width="20" height="26" viewBox="0 0 20 26">
    <path d="M9.68 26C8.133 26 0 14.826 0 9.68 0 4.37 4.37 0 9.68 0c5.311 0 9.682 4.37 9.682 9.68C19.362 14.827 11.23 26 9.68 26zm0-24.894c-4.701 0-8.574 3.873-8.574 8.575 0 4.702 7.192 14.162 8.575 15.157 1.383-.995 8.574-10.51 8.574-15.157 0-4.702-3.872-8.575-8.574-8.575z"/>
    <path d="M9.68 13.83c-2.267 0-4.148-1.881-4.148-4.15 0-2.267 1.88-4.148 4.149-4.148 2.268 0 4.149 1.88 4.149 4.149 0 2.268-1.881 4.149-4.15 4.149zm0-7.192c-1.659 0-3.042 1.383-3.042 3.043 0 1.66 1.383 3.042 3.043 3.042 1.66 0 3.042-1.383 3.042-3.042 0-1.66-1.383-3.043-3.042-3.043z"/>
  </symbol>
  <symbol id='icon-arrow' width="23" height="12" viewBox="0 0 23 12">
    <path fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M1.438.429L11.501 11.57 21.563.43"/>
  </symbol>
</svg>
<div class="appointment-scheduler row">
    <h3>{{c.options.title}}</h3>
    <div class="col-xs-12 remove-padding-left slot-selector">
        <div class='appt-datepicker'>
            <p class="input-group">
                <input type="text" class="form-control uidatepicker" uib-datepicker-popup ng-model="c.selectedDate" is-open="c.datePickerPopup.opened" datepicker-options="c.dateOptions" ng-required="true" close-text="Close" ng-change="c.getTimeSlots(c.selectedDate)"
                    ng-click="c.openDatePickerPopup()" />
                <span class='appt-dateformatted' ng-click="c.openDatePickerPopup()">{{c.dateFormatted}}</span>
                <span class='appt-change' ng-click="c.openDatePickerPopup()">CHANGE</span>
            </p>
        </div>
        <!--#####################Chiclet#################################################-->
        <div class="chiclets" ng-if="c.options.layout == 'Chiclets'">
            <p class="no-slots" ng-show="c.timeSLots.length == 0">
                -- No appointments available for selected date --
            </p>
            <button class="btn btn-slots" ng-class="{'disabled':slot.taken == 'yes','btn-selected':c.selectedSlot.date_time == slot.date_time }" ng-click="c.selectedSlot = slot" ng-repeat="slot in c.timeSLots">{{slot.time_slot}}</button>
        </div>
        <!--##########################Dropdown #########################################-->
        <div class="form-group col-md-12 remove-padding-left" ng-if="c.options.layout == 'Dropdown'">
            <p class="no-slots" ng-show="c.timeSLots.length == 0">
                -- No appointments available for selected date --
            </p>
            <select ng-show="c.timeSLots.length != 0" class="form-control" ng-options="slot as slot.time_slot for slot in c.timeSLots" ng-model="c.selectedSlot"></select>

        </div>

        <!--##################### Timecards #################################################-->
        <div class="chiclets" ng-if="c.options.layout == 'Timecards'">
            <p class="no-slots" ng-show="c.timeSLots.length == 0">
                -- No appointments available for selected date --
            </p>
            <div class="time-card-container">
                <div class="time-cards" ng-class="{'btn-selected':c.selectedSlot.date_time == slot.date_time }" ng-click="c.selectedSlot = slot" ng-repeat="slot in c.timeSLots">
                    <p>{{slot.time_slot}}</p>
                    <i ng-if="c.selectedSlot.date_time == slot.date_time" class="fa fa-2x fa-clock-o" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!--################## SHORT  DESCRIPTION ############################-->
        <div ng-if="c.options.show_short_description === 'true'" class='appt-field' ng-class="{'appt-field-placeholder' : c.appntShortDescription.length === 0}">
            <textarea ng-model='c.appntShortDescription' placeholder='Short description'></textarea>
        </div>
        <!--################## DESCRIPTION ############################-->
        <div ng-if="c.options.show_description === 'true'" class='appt-field' ng-class="{'appt-field-placeholder' : c.appntDescription.length === 0}">
            <textarea ng-model='c.appntDescription' placeholder='Description'></textarea>
        </div>
        <!--################## LOCATION ############################-->
        <div class="appt-field" ng-if="c.options.show_location === 'true'">
            <input id="autocomplete-input" ng-class="{'appt-field-placeholder' : !c.appntLocation}" typeahead-on-select="c.locationChosen($item)" type="text" ng-model="c.appntLocation" uib-typeahead="location as location.name for location in c.getLocations($viewValue)"
                typeahead-no-results="noResults" class="autocomplete" placeholder="Location">
        </div>
        <!--################## REMINDER ############################-->
        <div class='remind-container' ng-if="c.options.allow_reminders === 'true'">
            <div class='row'>
                <div class='switch-part'>
                    <div class="form-group" ng-show="c.timeSLots.length > 0">
                        <div class="input-switch">
                            <input ng-model="c.setReminder" type="checkbox">
                            <label aria-hidden="true" class="switch" ng-click='c.setReminder = !c.setReminder' for="setReminder"></label>
                            <label aria-hidden="true" class="switch-label" ng-click='c.setReminder = !c.setReminder'>Set Reminder</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class='time-selector'>
                    <div class='fade' ng-class="{'in':c.setReminder===true}">
                        <select class="form-control reminder-select" ng-options="time as time.label.display_value for time in c.data.reminderTimes" ng-model="c.selectedReminderTime"></select>
                        <label aria-hidden="true" class="reminder-select-label"> prior.</label>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <button id='btnContinue' class="btn btn-primary btn-submit" ng-class="{'disabled':!c.selectedSlot}" ng-click="c.submitTimeSlot(c.selectedDate,c.selectedSlot.date_time)">Submit</button>

        <div class="alert alert-div alert-success" ng-show="c.alertSuccess">
            <span class="close" ng-click="c.alertSuccess = false">x</span>
            <p>You are all set. See you on {{c.dateFormatted}}.</p>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TaskAppointmentUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TaskAppointmentUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var TaskAppointmentUtils = Class.create();
TaskAppointmentUtils.prototype = {
	
	/*
	Design Notes:
	
	A u_task_appointment record defines the time slots available for
	appointments to be made with an individual or group, and tracks all of
	the scheduled appointments as task records that reference the
	u_task_appointment. The duration of a time slot is configurable, but
	consistent for all time slots. Time slots will only be available during
	a schedule, which is configurable.
	
 	*/
	
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Appointment Scheduling Widget
	 * This function utilizes the u_task_appointment record for the large majority of the setup.  An encoded query can be passed
	 * to further filter the available timeslots.  Example would be get time slots based on a location, floor, etc.
	 *
	 * By default the reserved slots are not passed to the widget, but the value for showReserved could be passed as false and the
	 * reserved timeslots will be passed.  If the widget layout is Chiclets, reserved slots will show but be grayed out.
	*/
	getTimeSlots: function(taskApptID, selectedDate, encodedQuery, showReserved) {
		/*
 		* Example output:
 		* [{"date_time":"2017-06-19 08:00:00","sys_id":"","taken":"no","time_slot":"8:00AM"},
		* {"date_time":"2017-06-19 08:30:00","sys_id":"b400760ddb23f60087c1fd441d96193c","taken":"yes","time_slot":"8:30AM"},]
		*/
		
		if (gs.nil(showReserved)) {
			showReserved = false;
		}

		var answerList = [];

		var taskApptRec = new GlideRecord("u_task_appointment");
		taskApptRec.get(taskApptID);
		var apptDuration = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_appointment_duration, 10) * 60;
		var concurrentAppts = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_concurrent_appointments, 10);
		var leadTime = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_lead_time.dateNumericValue(), 10) / 1000; // In seconds
		if (gs.nil(concurrentAppts)) {
			concurrentAppts = 1;
		}
		
		var scheduleSlots = this._getScheduleSlots(taskApptRec.u_schedule, apptDuration, selectedDate, true, leadTime);
		var reservedList = this._getReservedSlots(taskApptRec, selectedDate.toString().split(" ")[0], scheduleSlots, encodedQuery);

		for (var i = 0; i < scheduleSlots.length; i++) {
			var slotDetails = {};
			var keyString = scheduleSlots[i].toString() + "";
			var slotKey = "t" + keyString.replace(/[-: ]/g, "");
			
			slotDetails.date_time = scheduleSlots[i].toString();
			slotDetails.time_slot = this._getTimeSlot(scheduleSlots[i].toString());
			
			var slotsOccupiedCount = parseInt(reservedList[slotKey].task_count, 10);
			if (slotsOccupiedCount) {
				if (slotsOccupiedCount >= concurrentAppts && showReserved) {
					slotDetails.taken = "yes";
					slotDetails.sys_id = reservedList[slotKey].sys_id;
				} else if (slotsOccupiedCount < concurrentAppts) {
					slotDetails.taken = "no";
					slotDetails.sys_id = reservedList[slotKey].sys_id;
				} else {
					continue;
				}
			} else {
				slotDetails.taken = "no";
				slotDetails.sys_id = "";
			}
			answerList.push(slotDetails);
		}

		var answer = new JSON().encode(answerList);
		return answer.toString();
	},

	_getTimeSlot: function(dateTime) {
		var timePortion = dateTime.toString().split(" ")[1];
		var timeArray = timePortion.toString().split(":");
		var hour = parseInt(timeArray[0].toString(), 10);
		var amPM = "";
		if (hour < 12) {
			amPM = "AM";
		} else if (hour == 12) {
			amPM = "PM";
		} else {
			hour = hour - 12;
			amPM = "PM";
		}
		var minutes = timeArray[1];
		
		return hour + ":" + minutes + amPM;
	},
	
	_getReservedSlots: function(taskApptRec, startDate, scheduleSlots, encodedQuery) {
		var apptDuration = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_appointment_duration, 10) * 60;
		var taskList = {}; // Key is slot date/time
		
		var taskRec = new GlideRecord(taskApptRec.u_task_type);
		taskRec.addQuery("u_task_appointment", taskApptRec.sys_id);
		taskRec.addQuery("work_start", ">=", gs.dateGenerate(startDate, "start"));
		taskRec.addQuery("work_end", "<=", gs.dateGenerate(startDate, "end"));
		if (!gs.nil(encodedQuery)) {
			taskRec.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
		}
		taskRec.orderBy("work_start");
		taskRec.query();
		while (taskRec.next()) {
			var workStart = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_start).getDisplayValueInternal() + "";
			var workEnd = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_end).getDisplayValueInternal() + "";
			var taskID = taskRec.sys_id.toString();
			
			taskList = this._setTaskDetails(workStart, taskID, taskList);
			
			// Check to see if task takes up multiple slots
			var workDuration = gs.dateDiff(workStart, workEnd, true);
			if (workDuration > apptDuration) {
				var slotIndex = scheduleSlots.indexOf(workStart) + 1;
				var slotValue = scheduleSlots[slotIndex];
				var tempDate = new GlideDateTime(slotValue);
				
				while (tempDate < workEnd) {
					taskList = this._setTaskDetails(slotValue, taskID, taskList);
					slotIndex += 1;
					slotValue = scheduleSlots[slotIndex];
					tempDate.setValue(slotValue);
				}
			}
		}
		//gs.log("taskList: " + new JSON().encode(taskList));
		return taskList;
	},

	_setTaskDetails: function(taskStart, taskID, taskList) {
		var slotKey = "t" +	taskStart.replace(/[-: ]/g, "");
		if (taskList[slotKey]) {
			var sysIDList = taskList[slotKey].sys_id.toString().split(",");
			if (sysIDList.indexOf(taskID) == -1) {
				sysIDList.push(taskID);
				taskList[slotKey].task_count = sysIDList.length;
				sysIDList = sysIDList.join(",").toString();
				taskList[slotKey].sys_id = sysIDList;
			}
		} else {
			var taskDetails = {};
			taskDetails.sys_id = taskID;
			taskDetails.task_count = 1;
			taskList[slotKey] = taskDetails;
		}
			
		return taskList;
	},
	
	_getScheduleSlots: function(scheduleID, apptDuration, startDate, startFromNow, leadTime) {
		var answerList = [];
		
		if (gs.nil(startFromNow)) {
			startFromNow = true;
		}
		
		var nowDateTime = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValueInternal();
		nowDateTime = new GlideDateTime(nowDateTime);
		
		if (!gs.nil(leadTime) && leadTime > 0) {
			nowDateTime.addSeconds(leadTime);
		}
				
		var userTZ = gs.getUser().getTZ();
		var schedule = new GlideSchedule(scheduleID);
		schedule.setTimeZone(userTZ);
		
		if (gs.nil(startDate)) {
			startDate = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValueInternal();
			startDate = new GlideDateTime(startDate.toString().split(" ")[0]);
		} else {
			startDate = new GlideDateTime(startDate);
		}
		
		var endDate = new GlideDateTime(startDate);
		endDate.addDays(1);
		
		var spans = schedule.getSpans(startDate, endDate);
		
		if (gs.nil(spans)) {
			// Do nothing since no group isn't available and pass empty answerList
		} else {
			var schStart;
			var schEnd;
			for (var i = 0; i < spans.size(); i++) {
				var span = spans.get(i);
				var spanStart = new GlideDateTime(span.getStart().toString());
				var spanEnd = new GlideDateTime(span.getEnd().toString());
				if (spanStart < startDate && spanEnd > startDate) {
					schStart = startDate;
				} else {
					schStart = spanStart;
				}
				if (spanStart < endDate && spanEnd > endDate) {
					schEnd = endDate;
				} else {
					schEnd = spanEnd;
				}
				
				var tempStart = new GlideDateTime(schStart);
				while (tempStart < schEnd) {
					if (startFromNow) {
						if (nowDateTime < tempStart) {
							answerList.push(tempStart + "");
						}
					} else {
						answerList.push(tempStart + "");
					}
					tempStart.addSeconds(apptDuration);
				}
			}
		}
		//gs.log("_getScheduleSlots: " + new JSON().encode(answerList));
		return answerList;
	},

	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Appointment Scheduling Widget
	 * This function is called when the user clicks the submit button and it will create a record in the task table defined in the
	 * u_task_appointment record. 
	 *
	 * The timeSlot must be passed in as YYYY-DD-MM hh:mm:ss format.  The widget is designed to do that. 
	 *
	 * Additional fields can be passed as a key:value pair.  The key must be a valid field in the task table defined in the 
	 * u_task_appointment record.
	*/
	
	createAppointment: function(taskApptID, timeSlot, additionalFields) {
		var taskApptRec = new GlideRecord("u_task_appointment");
		taskApptRec.get(taskApptID);
		
		if (!gs.nil(additionalFields)) {
			if (additionalFields.work_start) {
				timeSlot = additionalFields.work_start;
			}	
		}

		var taskRec = new GlideRecord(taskApptRec.u_task_type);
		taskRec.newRecord();
		taskRec.applyEncodedQuery(taskApptRec.u_task_values);
		taskRec.u_task_appointment = taskApptRec.sys_id;

		// Check if assignment group was filled in via template values and if not default it to the task appointment group.
		if (gs.nil(taskRec.assignment_group)) {
			taskRec.assignment_group = taskApptRec.u_group;
		}
		
		var workStart = new GlideDateTime();
		workStart.setDisplayValueInternal(timeSlot);
		taskRec.work_start = workStart;
		var endTemp = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_start);
		var apptDuration = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_appointment_duration, 10) * 60;
		endTemp.addSeconds(apptDuration);
		taskRec.work_end = endTemp;
		
		// Set any additional values passed in via additionalFields
		if (!gs.nil(additionalFields)) {
			var keys = Object.keys(additionalFields).toString();
			var keysList = keys.split(",");
			
			for (var i = 0; i < keysList.length; i++) {
				var fieldName = keysList[i].trim();
				var fieldValue = additionalFields[fieldName].trim();
				if (!gs.nil(fieldValue) && taskRec.isValidField(fieldName)) {
					taskRec[fieldName] = fieldValue;
				}
			}
		}
		
		// Capture return details for the Service Portal Widget
		var answer = {};
		var taskID = taskRec.insert();
		answer.number = taskRec.number.toString();
		answer.sys_id = taskID;
		
		answer = new JSON().encode(answer);
		return answer.toString();
	},
	
	/*
	 * This is the function is currently NOT utilized but here in case it is needed.
	*/
	
	updateAppointment: function(taskApptID, taskID, timeSlot, additionalFields) {
		var taskApptRec = new GlideRecord("u_task_appointment");
		taskApptRec.get(taskApptID);
		
		if (!gs.nil(additionalFields)) {
			if (additionalFields.work_start) {
				timeSlot = additionalFields.work_start;
			}	
		}

		var taskRec = new GlideRecord(taskApptRec.u_task_type);
		taskRec.get(taskID);

		taskRec.u_task_appointment = taskApptRec.sys_id;
		var workStart = new GlideDateTime();
		workStart.setDisplayValueInternal(timeSlot);
		taskRec.work_start = workStart;
		
		var endTemp = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_start);
		var apptDuration = parseInt(taskApptRec.u_appointment_duration, 10) * 60;
		endTemp.addSeconds(apptDuration);
		taskRec.work_end = endTemp;
		
		// Set any additional values passed in via additionalFields
		if (!gs.nil(additionalFields)) {
			var keys = Object.keys(additionalFields).toString();
			var keysList = keys.split(",");
			
			for (var i = 0; i < keysList.length; i++) {
				var fieldName = keysList[i].trim();
				var fieldValue = additionalFields[fieldName].trim();
				if (!gs.nil(fieldValue) && taskRec.isValidField(fieldName)) {
					taskRec[fieldName] = fieldValue;
				}
			}
		}
		taskRec.update();
		
		// Capture return details for the Service Portal Widget
		var answer = {};
		answer.number = taskRec.number.toString();
		answer.sys_id = taskID;
		
		answer = new JSON().encode(answer);
		return answer.toString();
	},

	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Appointment Scheduling Widget
	 * This function is called if widget preferences allow remiders and if the user chooses to have a reminder set. 
	 *
	 * This leveraged an undocumented Reminder feature that has been in the platform since the beginning.  Details on this feature can be found
	 * in TechNow Episode 39: https://community.servicenow.com/message/1182600
	*/
	
	createReminder: function(taskID, timeBefore) {
		var reminderRec = new GlideRecord("reminder");
		reminderRec.newRecord();
		reminderRec.task = taskID;
		reminderRec.remind_me = timeBefore;
		reminderRec.user = gs.getUserID();
		reminderRec.field = "work_start";
		reminderRec.subject = "You have an appointment at " + reminderRec.task.work_start.getDisplayValue();
		var reminderRecID = reminderRec.insert();

		return reminderRecID;
	},
	
	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Appointment List Widget
	 * This function is called if a user clicks the trash can to delete the appointment. 
	 *
	 * This function will delete the incident from the database.  This could be tweaked to mark the task as cancelled if preferred.
	*/
	
	removeAppointment: function(taskApptID, taskID) {
		var taskApptRec = new GlideRecord("u_task_appointment");
		taskApptRec.get(taskApptID);

		var taskRec = new GlideRecord(taskApptRec.u_task_type);
		taskRec.get(taskID);
		taskRec.deleteRecord();
		
		var reminderRec = new GlideRecord("reminder");
		reminderRec.addQuery("task", taskID);
		reminderRec.query();
		reminderRec.deleteMultiple();
	},

	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Appointment List Widget
	 * This function provides a list of appointments for the logged in user that will be displayed in the widget. 
	 *
	 * This function can accept a comma separated list of field names for the table task table defined in the
	 * u_task_appointment record. 
	*/
	
	getUserAppointments: function(taskApptID, additionalFields, userID) {
		var taskTable = "task";
		if (taskApptID) {
			var taskApptRec = new GlideRecord("u_task_appointment");
			taskApptRec.get(taskApptID);
			taskTable = !gs.nil(taskApptRec.u_task_type) ? taskApptRec.u_task_type: taskTable;
		}
		
		var taskList = [];
		var taskRec = new GlideRecord(taskTable);
		taskRec.addNotNullQuery("u_task_appointment");
		if (gs.nil(userID)) {
			taskRec.addQuery("opened_by", gs.getUserID());
		} else {
			taskRec.addQuery("opened_by", userID);
		}
		taskRec.addQuery("work_start", ">=", gs.minutesAgoStart(0));
		taskRec.orderBy("work_start");
		taskRec.query();
		while (taskRec.next()) {
			var taskDetails = {};
			taskDetails.sys_id = taskRec.sys_id.toString();
			taskDetails.number = taskRec.number.toString();
			taskDetails.work_start = taskRec.work_start.getDisplayValue().toString();
			taskDetails.work_end = taskRec.work_end.getDisplayValue().toString();
			taskDetails.duration = gs.dateDiff(taskRec.work_start.getDisplayValue(), taskRec.work_end.getDisplayValue(), true);
			taskDetails.short_description = taskRec.short_description.toString();
			taskDetails.assignee_name = taskRec.assigned_to.getDisplayValue().toString();
			taskDetails.assignee_sys_id = taskRec.assigned_to.toString();
			taskDetails.location_name = taskRec.location.getDisplayValue().toString();
			taskDetails.location_sys_id = taskRec.location.toString();
			if (taskDetails.assignee_sys_id) {
				taskDetails.assignee_info = this._getUserDetails(taskDetails.assignee_sys_id);
			}
			
			// Set any additional values needed via additionalFields
			if (!gs.nil(additionalFields)) {
				var additionalFieldsList = additionalFields.split(",");

				for (var i = 0; i < additionalFieldsList.length; i++) {
					var fieldName = additionalFieldsList[i].trim();
					var fieldValue = "";
					if (taskRec.isValidField(fieldName)) {
						fieldValue = taskRec[fieldName].toString();
					} else if (taskRec.getTableName() == "task" && taskRec.sys_class_name != "task") {
						var tempName = "ref_" + taskRec.sys_class_name + "." + fieldName;
						var tempValue = taskRec.getElement(tempName);
						if (!gs.nil(tempValue)) {
							fieldValue = tempValue.toString();
						}
					}
					taskDetails[fieldName] = fieldValue;
				}
			}
			taskList.push(taskDetails);
		}

		var answer = new JSON().encode(taskList);
		return answer.toString();
	},
	
	_getUserDetails: function(userID) {
		var answer = {};
		var userRec = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRec.addQuery("sys_id", userID);
		userRec.query();
		if (userRec.next()) {
			answer.email = userRec.email.toString();
			answer.phone = userRec.phone.toString();
			answer.photo = userRec.photo.getDisplayValue();
			answer.initials = userRec.first_name.charAt(0) + userRec.last_name.charAt(0);
		}
		
		return answer;
	},
	
	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Enforce Task Appointment Schedule Business Rule
	 * This function zeros out the seconds on the date provided.  This is important to determine scheduled timeslots.
	 */
	
	setZeroSeconds: function(dateTime) {
		var timeString = dateTime.toString();
		seconds = parseInt(timeString.slice(-2), 10);
		if (seconds > 0) {
			timeString = timeString.substr(0, timeString.length - 2) + "00";
		}
		
		return new GlideDateTime(timeString);
	},
	
	/*
	 * This is the function utilized by the Enforce Task Appointment Schedule Business Rule
	 * This function checks the dates associated to an appointment record to ensure it is within the schedule defined in the
	 * u_task_appointment record.
	 *
	 * The work_start value must be within the schedule.
	 * The work_end must conform to the duration timeframe selected.  In other words, if the Task Appointment Duration is set
	 * to 30 minutes, a task can have a duration of 1 hour, 1.5 hours, 2 hours, etc in 30 minute increments.
	 */
	
	checkTaskDates: function(taskRec) {
		var answer = [];
		
		var nowDateTime = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValueInternal();
		nowDateTime = new GlideDateTime(nowDateTime);
		
		var scheduleID = taskRec.u_task_appointment.u_schedule;
		var apptDuration = parseInt(taskRec.u_task_appointment.u_appointment_duration, 10) * 60;
		var selectedDate = taskRec.work_start.toString().split(" ")[0];
		var startDate = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_start).getDisplayValueInternal();
		var endDate = new GlideDateTime(taskRec.work_end).getDisplayValueInternal();
		var scheduleSlots = this._getScheduleSlots(scheduleID, apptDuration, selectedDate, false);
		if (scheduleSlots.indexOf(startDate + "") == -1) {
			answer.push("Start time is outside the schedule.");
		}
		
		var taskDuration = parseInt(gs.dateDiff(startDate, endDate, true), 10);
		if (taskDuration%apptDuration) {
			answer.push("End time must be in " + taskRec.u_task_appointment.u_appointment_duration + " minute intervals.");
		}
		
		return answer == "" ? "allClear" : answer.join(" ");
	},
	
	type: 'TaskAppointmentUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michael.ritchie</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-19 19:17:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>c4d5f288dbe3760087c1fd441d9619d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>281</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TaskAppointmentUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c4d5f288dbe3760087c1fd441d9619d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-22 19:27:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
